content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -80.0) with coal as fuel and iron ore as input to produce iron plates.

### Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -82.0) with coal as fuel and has produced iron plates.

### Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -84.0) with coal as fuel but has no ingredients to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Make sure to move to the target position before placing an entity to avoid distance-related errors.

### Errors when placing entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when harvesting resources without being in range
- Move to the nearest resource before attempting to harvest to avoid range-related errors.

### Errors when inserting items into entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity.

### Errors when harvesting resources without being in range after moving
- After moving to a resource, ensure you are in range and the resource is available before attempting to harvest.
